sentence.Network_en: Increasingly, corporate clients are seeking to outsource the management of their facilities.
sentence.Network_cn: 越来越多的公司客户寻求将设施的管理外包出去。

sentence.Network_en: The baron became increasingly heated over the hypocrisy of it all.
sentence.Network_cn: 男爵对整件事的虚伪感到越来越生气。

sentence.Network_en: She felt nervous, increasingly lacking in confidence about herself.
sentence.Network_cn: 她感到紧张，对自己越来越没有信心。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新视野大学英语单词表_百度文库 ... conduct 传导，行为，举止 increasingly 日益，愈加 conference 会议.
大学英语四级考试大纲(I)|英语四级词汇 ... increase vt.&vi.&n. 增加 increasingly ad. 日益，越来越多地 indeed ad. 真正地；确实.
新视野大学英语单词表_百度文库 ... conduct 传导，行为，举止 increasingly 日益，愈加 conference 会议.
more and more越来越increasinglyHe speaks more and more openly about his problem.他.

list.abs: White - collar crime is an increasingly serious problem ., 白领犯罪是一个越来越严重的问题.
CJ or China , Asia and the direct market increasingly influential large - scale online games show ., CJ 还是中国 , 亚洲乃至直接市场越来越有影响力的大型网游展会.
Women are playing an increasingly important part in society today ., 妇女在当今社会扮演着越来越重要的角色.
play an increasingly important role in ., 发挥着日益重要的作用.
higherare prevented from becoming increasingly colder and low latitudes from becoming increasingly hotter ., 通过这种途径 , 使高纬地区不能变得越来越冷 , 而低纬地区不能变得越来越热.

entry.def: You can use increasingly to indicate that a situation or quality is becoming greater in intensity or more common.

example.ex: He was finding it increasingly difficult to make decisions...
example.tran: 他发现越来越难以作出决定。

example.ex: There is an increasingly popular alternative...
example.tran: 有了越来越受欢迎的替代品。

auth_sentence.content: China , again, is increasingly the major player.
auth_sentence.res_content: China , again, is increasingly the major player.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: China , again, is increasingly the major player.

auth_sentence.content: Increasingly, women and their infants are being affected.
auth_sentence.res_content: Increasingly, women and their infants are being affected.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Increasingly, women and their infants are being affected.

auth_sentence.content: But, increasingly, they are finding the dead.
auth_sentence.res_content: But, increasingly, they are finding the dead.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But, increasingly, they are finding the dead.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,表示"……的",通常在在名词后.; 2. 表副词,放在形容词后,"……地"

stems_affixes.word_buile: come来+ly……的→翩翩而来→美丽动人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cost代价+ly……的→adj.昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
drizz毛毛雨+ly……的→adj.毛毛雨的[a drizzly day]
friend朋友+ly……的→adj.友好的,友谊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很可能的,合适的,可靠的
stems_affixes.word_buile: like像+ly……的→adj.很可能的,合适的,可靠的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: live活+ly……的→adj.活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
man男人+ly……的→adj.男子气概的,果断的
niggard小气鬼+ly……的→adj.吝啬的,勉强的
otherworld超世+ly……的→adj.超脱尘世的,超俗的
spindle细长的人[或物]+ly……的→spindly细长的,纤弱的
time时间+ly……的→adj.及时的,适时的
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
continuous连续的+ly……的→adv.不断地,连续地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 幸福地,愉快地,恰当地,幸亏
stems_affixes.word_buile: happy快乐的,幸福的+ly……的→happily幸福地
active积极的+ly……地→adv.活跃地,积极地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
according相符的+ly……地→adv.因此,从而
final最后的+ly……地→adv.最后,终于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
stems_affixes.word_buile: actual[adj.实际的, 真实的, 现行的, 目前的]+ly……地→adv.实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
adequate足够的+ly……地→adv.充分地
consequent作为结果的+ly……地→adv.从而,因此
anxious担忧的+ly……地→adv.忧虑地,不安地
biological[adj.生物学的]+ly……地→adv.生物学上
certain肯定的+ly……地→adv.的确,[口语]当然,行
chief主要的+ly……地→adv.首要,主要地
commercial商业的+ly……地→adv.商业上,通商上

stems_affixes.value_cn: 普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
stems_affixes.word_buile: current当前的,流动的+ly……地→adv.普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
decided确定的+ly……地→adv.果断地,断然地
definite明确的+ly……地→adv.一定地,明确地
easy容易的+ly……地→easily容易地
economical节约的,经济的+ly……地→adv.经济地,经济学地
exact强求,精确的+ly……地→adv.正确地,严密地
exceeding非常的+ly……地→adv.极端地,非常
excessive过分的+ly……地→adv.过分地,非常地
extreme极端的+ly……地→adv.极端地,极其,非常
aggressive侵略的+ly……地→adv. 侵略地,攻势地
financial财政的,金融的+ly……地→adv.财政上,金融上
formal正式的;形式的+ly……地→adv.正式地,形式上
fortunate幸运的+ly……地→adv.幸运地
general总的,大体的+ly……地→adv.一般,通常,一般地
glorious光荣的,显赫的+ly……地→adv.光荣地,辉煌地
great大的+ly……地→adv.大大地,非常
immediate立即的+ly……地→adv.立即,马上,直接地
incidental附带的+ly……地→adv.附带地,顺便提及
increasing渐增的+ly……地→adv.日益,愈加
instant立即的;紧迫的+ly……地→adv.立即地,即刻地
like像+ly……地→有些像的→很可能
logical逻辑的,符合逻辑的+ly……地→adv.论理上,逻辑上
mental精神的+ly……地→adv.精神上,智力上,在内心
moderate中等的,适度的+ly……地→adv.适度地
natural自然的+ly……地→adv.自然地
necessary必要的+ly……地→necessarily必要地
polite有礼貌的+ly……地→adv.客气地,斯文地,优雅地
positive肯定的,积极的+ly……地→adv.断然地;肯定地
preferable更可取的+ly……地→preferably更适宜
present现在+ly……地→adv.目前,不久
probable可能的+ly……地→probably或许,大概
progressive前进的+ly……地→adv.日益增多地
prompt敏捷的+ly……地→adv.敏捷地,迅速地
relative相对的;相关的+ly……地→adv.相关地
repeated重复的+ly表副词→adv.重复地,再三地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 立刻,不久,简略地,简言之,即刻
stems_affixes.word_buile: short短+ly……地→adv.立刻,不久,简略地,简言之,即刻
sufficient足够的+ly……地→adv.十分地,充分地
undoubted无疑的,确实的+ly……地→adv.无庸置疑地,的确地
unfortunate不幸的+ly……地→adv.不幸地
uniform贯的,一致的+ly……地→adv.一律地,均一地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊

Sentence.sentence: Some scientistsmaintain that the changes we are seeing fall within the range of random (无规律的) variation—some years are cold, others warm, and we have just had an unremarkable string of warm yearsrecently—but that is becoming an increasingly rare interpretation in the face of continued and increasing warm conditions.
Finally, flexibility and balance training are increasingly important as the body ages.

In the absence of societal pressures to maintain pair-bonds, O'Sullivan suggests that romantic love has increasingly come to be seen as the factor that should determine who we stay with and for how long

Family-friendly policies are its norm-with 16months of paid parental leave,special protections for part-time workers,and state-subsidized preschools where,according to a government website,"gender-awareness education is increasingly common.
Now we increasingly get rustle and crunch.
With production anticipated to increase by 25% between now and 2030, sustainable energy sourcing will become an increasingly major issue

means.word_mean: 日益, 越来越多地, 不断增加地

sentences.en: I find it increasingly difficult to live within my income.
sentences.cn: 我发现靠收入过日子越来越难了。

sentences.en: Rivers are being increasingly made use of by man.
sentences.cn: 河流正在日益为人类所利用。

jushi.english: I find it increasingly difficult to live within my income.
jushi.chinese: 我发现仅靠收入过日子越来越难了。

jushi.english: He grew increasingly to rely on her.
jushi.chinese: 他变得越来越依赖她了。
